title: Hot artichoke sin

default: 1x400g can artichoke hearts, drained, chopped chunky

steps: In a bowl, mix together the artichokes, mayonnaise, cheese and chillies. Spread into a wide baking dish in a layer not more than 2cm/¾in thick.
Bake the mixture until bubbling and golden, about 15 minutes. Serve with tortilla chips for scooping.
